title: Weekly Swarm Sessions
description: The Catalyst community needs organized spaces to discuss and brainstorm on current issues and projects

title: Micropayments for Catalyst
description: A lack of incentives for contributing to Catalyst means that those without the leisure time may be forgoing paid work to participate

title: Catalyst Video Series w/Kaizen
description: Catalyst has hundreds of proposals being submitted and the average person lacks a simple way to understand the mission behind each project.

title: In-Wallet Onboarding for ADAholders
description: Current wallet software separates utility and education, creating a barrier for people to enter and to trust the crypto space and Cardano.

title: The Catalyst School
description: Proposers, Advisors, Voters and other Catalyst members still struggle to understand how Catalyst works and how to play their roles.

title: Match members profiles with tasks
description: New members wish to support catalysts but it is time-consuming and complex to learn how one can engage

title: Animated Explainer Videos-AIM
description: Many Catalyst concepts are is difficult to understand and hard to explain.

title: Marketing, Marketing, Marketing!
description: The majority of ADA holders eligible to vote either have never voted or never heard of Catalyst.

title: The Catalyst School - NFT Rewards
description: Encouraging meaningful participation requires experimenting with different approaches to determine the best way to engage the community.

title: The Catalyst School - Website
description: Education about Catalyst would benefit from a more fluid and tailored experience for new community members to help increase engagement.

title: Eastern TownHall Team Operation
description: Participating in Catalyst is difficult when you live in the eastern time zone and your language is not English.

title: Let's make Live-NFT's with 2500 Art
description: Cardano will struggle with adoption by young people without collaboration from established artists and key amplifiers from arts & culture.

title: Community Site: Development - AIM
description: The site helps onboard 1000s of users. New features are requested & ideated, upgrades are required. Bounty system needs further development.

title: Incentivized Voter Survey - AIM
description: Information about how voters interact with Catalyst is not well understood, and there are few initiatives tackling this at the moment.

title: Catalyst-Swarm-Genesis GitBook
description: Documentation of Catalyst-Swarm, a self organizing community supporting the success of Project Catalyst, requires support to be sustainable.

title: Catalyst Buddies System
description: It takes too long+too many resources to understand when&how to contribute and engage in Catalyst.

title: 80 Multi Language How to ?-podcasts
description: News & education about Cardano & blockchain should be available in native languages. However, The crypto world is English-speaking oriented

title: Decentralized Catalyst Incubator
description: What are the best practices for adapting the incubator model to support new Catalyst startup?

title: Tutorchain.io - Catalyst use case
description: Finding an expert or monetizing your expertise requires centralized vetting services that limit your choices and control your access.

title: Global Mission Driven News Room
description: There isn't enough participation + story sharing about SPOs in the Cardano ecosystem, in different languages globally, found in one place.

title: The Blockchain Class by Adatruth
description: Newcomers need education to understand the system + recognise scams. Lack of content on real world use cases explaining the vision + basics.

title: Catalyst 24h Streaming TV Programs
description: How to show new people Catalyst projects success, experience & benefits of involvement? How to entertain & motivate to make proposals?

title: NAGchi Cares
description: Defining and creating the conditions for meaningful participation across a global community of never ending epochs is timeless.

title: WADA Uni Students Catalyst Registry
description: University students are the future of blockchain tech but they aren't fully engaged in the Project Catalyst program.

title: Off to On-Chain Self Governance
description: Conflict resolution is difficult without an agreed upon history documented on blockchain.

title: Community Subscription Fees Recoup
description: Some expenses this past year have been covered by individual members of the community. Discord, Zoom, Miro all have costs associated.
